p: Lopinavir/Ritonavir is a protease inhibitor approved for the treatment of HIV ( 108). Lopinavir was approved for the treatment of SARS-CoV during the epidemic of 2003 because it showed inhibitory activity against the virus in vitro. Lopinavir was also used against MERS-CoV because it has inhibitory activity against the virus both in vitro and in an animal models ( 109, 110). Lopinavir is used in combination with ritonavir because it increases the plasma half-life of lopinavir inhibiting the cytochrome P450 ( 111).
